Key Match Events: James Harden recorded a triple-double with 35 points, 11 rebounds, and 11 assists in the final seconds of the game, securing the win for the Clippers.
Yves Missi missed a crucial free throw that could have tied the game at 114 with 4.3 seconds left, setting up the final play where James Harden made two free throws to secure the win.
Post-Match Reflections: James Harden expressed satisfaction with the team's comeback win, emphasizing the importance of resilience and teamwork.
Coach Tyronn Lue praised the performance of Norman Powell and James Harden, highlighting their leadership in the victory.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pelicans, who had lost 10 straight games and 19 of their last 20, struggled to keep pace with the Clippers throughout the game.
The Clippers outrebounded the Pelicans 40-35 and outscored them in the paint 56-44, which were key factors in their victory.
